thread.title: Dior Homme Teams With Japanese Artist Toru Kamei for Exclusive Collection
thread.title_full: Dior Homme Teams With Japanese Artist Toru Kamei for Exclusive Collection

author: Marcus Cho
title: Dior Homme Teams With Japanese Artist Toru Kamei for Exclusive Collection
text:
Visit the original post to see all 10 images from this gallery. 
Brand: Dior Homme x Toru Kamei
Season: SS17
Key Pieces: Supple leather backpack imbued with a flower motif, and a pair of low-top slip-on sneakers featuring the same flower designs prevalent throughout the collection.
Editor’s Notes: As the spring season approaches, fashionistas are taking to the shops to upgrade and revamp their wardrobes – which is why this drop couldn’t have arrived at a better time. The Toru Kamei-created floral patterning contrasted by skulls is just the right touch of “beautiful and dark,” making the pieces both standouts and wearable additions to any closet.
PAST TO FUTURE | Artwork by Japanese artist Toru Kamei | @Kris_Van_Assche's #DiorHomme Summer 2017 collection. 
A post shared by Dior Homme Official (@diorhomme) on Mar 4, 2017 at 5:04am PST
